post.body: Fell asleep during Higurashi movie (too tired!); sleeping; new blog posts btw!
New posts on blog!
New post: Headlines of the Future~
So apparently, building roads creates jobs. Hooray. But who pays the workers? The government. Who pays the government? Us! Wth, Obama?
Ore ga NEET da yo! <<< Hahahaha.
New post up! To Aru Majutsu no Index 11 review
To Aru Majutsu no Index 11 review comin' right up! XP
...Random update. (Would this be called a 'Twit'...?)
CoD atm, gonna hit the mall for some xmas shopping (I'm so slow!)
CoD 1 is still fun. XP ; Making a Gundam cockpit wallpaper/DesktopX maybe? ; Going to bed...
At a friend's place jc and watching a movie =P
New post! To Aru Majutsu no Index Ep. 10 Review, see the blog! =P
Zzzzzz.... ; P
Watching Toaru Majutsu no Index right now - will catch up soon... XP
On IM; just got off the phone; editing a wallpaper; reading 'The Man From St. Petersburg' <3
Trying to decide between two smexy coats, but refuses to ask the Intarweb. x_x
Bored+Needs to post on the blog!
Going to sleep! After re-watching more Higurashi no Naku Koro ni. <3 Yay. =) TGIF / Well, it's Saturday now... but... yeah.
'...I don't know if it's cloudy or bright... 'cause I only have eyes for-' physics. =/
F-ed up the video drivers with a new ver. GeForce Go 7600 drivers suck even though it's not an amazing card.. =(
Finally fed up with pouring through endless documents, so confusing! (And trying Twitter on mobile web.)
Playing FFXII. Gotta love it. =P
Getting an evil stare-down as I explain what Twitter is to my gf.
Away 'til Tuesday~ =]
New post! Toaru Majutsu no Index Episode 12 Reviewed!
'Forewarned is forearmed' - Haha.
New Toaru Majutsu no Index OP / 12012, Gackt New Single / BUCK-TICK, Avex V.A., Miyavi New Album
